TopicTitle: Mass increases everytime you go back to Space Center

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

today I started my first interplanetary Mission to Eve and I failed epicly, because the mass of my Satellite, which was ment to orbit, Eve was increasing every time I went back to the Space Center. In the end it was about 21 *10Ã‚Â¹Ã‚Â² kg, and I definitely wasn't travelling at the speed of light

Strangely that effect only appeared with that satellite and not the landing Probe, which was also orbiting Eve at that point. I got parts of the Kethane mod and the SCANsat mod attached to the Satellite (and not to the Probe), which could be the reason for that bug.

I tried uninstalling a few mods to see what caused the problem, but after restarting the game, even with all mods installed, the bug was gone, which means the mass was not increasing anymore, but still at that high value.

List of mods I got installed:

Kerbal Engineer

Tweak Scale

Station Science

SCANsat

ProceduralFairings

MechJeb2

Infernal Robotics

Kethane

Kerbal Attachment System

Texture Compressor

Toolbar Plugin

Does anybody have the same problem?

Greetings,

Rucksack

mass about 2,7*10Ã‚Â¹Ã‚Â² kg (pretty damn heavy for such a satellite...)

30 seconds later, after switching to the Space Center and back: mass about 22 *10Ã‚Â¹Ã‚Â² kg (even heavier!!!)

Revert to TweakScale 1.44, or download and compile TweakScale from the most recent source.

Welcome to the forums! In the future, we'll probably also need an output log and versions for your mods to help solve problems. Read more about that in the How to Get Support sticky.
Thank you very much, it's working now

Having the same issue on my Mac version... I suspected tweak scale, since i could repeat the bug inside VAB by bumping the size of a part larger than smaller then larger again... The Mass increased every time

Edited December 15, 2014 by richfiles
